cardFeatures.title: Award-winning architecture
cardFeatures.text: Every achievement begins with a vision. It is built on a foundation of creative concepts and dreams to become something bigger and better. At AlphaConstruction we build with those who follow a vision, not a path.

cardFeatures.title: Relentless pursuit of your vision
cardFeatures.text: Our commitment to excellence and continous improvement, to building lasting relationships with our clients, and to the team members who create your vision, are the guiding principles that assure successful outcomes on every project we build.

cardFeatures.title: Your vision - Our mission
cardFeatures.text: To build an everlasting environment of trust with our clients and team members that will foster customer loyalty by delivering superior service and quality projects.

testimonials.author: Coretta Scott King
testimonials.quote: The greatness of a community is most accurately measured by the compassionate actions of its members.

testimonials.author: Jason Schraiber
testimonials.title: Mayor, Boca Raton
testimonials.quote: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level over Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

testimonials.author: Joe Malonagi
testimonials.title: General Manager, Springfield Tower
testimonials.quote: The complexities and challenges AlphaConstruction successfully overcame on our behalf includes substantial permit obstacles, coordination and selection support of all design and finish materials, and the diffculty of integrating existing and new structures.

items.title: help beyond compassion
items.body: We aim to help the underprivileged by providing for their well-being and their basic necessities in a compassionate manner.

items.title: giving without borders
items.body: Not only do we aid domestic communities, we also give globally to international communities.

items.title: grow within communities
items.body: To help tighten the bond within a community, our projects requires Beyond Compassions involvement. In order to help them compassionately, the best way is to understand and respect their way of life and come up with resolution accordingly.

items.name: Beyond Compassion 2019 Holiday Project: Bringing the holidays to a Filipino Village
items.description: In December 2019 Beyond Compassion will be hosting its holiday charity event in Mindinao, where the Philippines poorest regions are located. Beyond Compassion works with the Fiipino Army to get supplies to some of the most remote, destitute villages in the Philippines. This event is held in a compassionate manner. Guests receive gifts such as rice, beans, clothing and shoes. Villagers participate it games such as picking money from buckets while blindfolding. The events purpose is to make participants happy and joyful while receiving basic necessities and money for future needs.

items.name: 2018 Holiday Celebration
items.description: Beyond Compassion hosted itâ€™s 2018 Holiday celebration in Davao, Philippines. All participating villagers were treated to a sumptuous holiday meal in a familiar environment. Children participated in games to win prizes for their families. The highlight of the celebration was when everyone tried their luck to pick the highest denomination of money from a bucket while blindfolded. Guests received parting gifts such as tools, food or clothes to enjoy when the party was over.
